sentence.Network_en: Have a dekko at this wheel: the tyre's flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 瞧瞧这个轮子,轮胎瘪了.

list.abs: 英语口语实用短句大... ... Let's go and see. 我们去看看。 Let's have a dekko. 让我们看一看。 Let's have a try. 让咱们试一下。.
left angle 左角  loss angle 损失角/损耗角<<电>>  pull angle 卷绕角  rear angle 齿背角  reel angle 箴角  angle dekko 测角仪  angle drive 转角.
什么意思... ... Hot Crisp Silverfish 香辣脆皮银鱼 dekko silverfish packs on 心很累 Silverfish Aquarium 银鱼水族箱.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally used by the British army in India): from Hindi dekho 'look!', imperative of dekhnā

auth_sentence.content: Once I'd grabbed hold of the script and taken a good dekko at it, my worst fears were confirmed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once I'd grabbed hold of the script and taken a good dekko at it, my worst fears were confirmed.
